Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChequingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public abstract class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class and contains all common data members for all Bank Accounts
